TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Charlie_Beasley, title = Charlie_Beasley, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlie_Beasley} }

S.FORM: Charlie Beasley nalecuhan i Shawnee, Oklahoma, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Charlie Beasley i 1967 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 7 ku uwac atu silsil 74, namapili' tu nu Cincinnati Royals putiput. 9 bulad 23 demiad, 1945 a mihca, Charlie Beasley, miunduay. (mapatay i 2015 a mihca)

Charlie Beasley nalecohan i Shawnee, Oklahoma, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot. Charlie Beasley i 1967 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 7 ko owac ato silsil 74, namapili' to no Cincinnati Royals potipot. 9 bolad 23 demiad, 1945 a mihca, Charlie Beasley, miondoay. (mapatay i 2015 a mihca)
